techmeme.title: Google begins rolling out speedometers in Google Maps for iOS and CarPlay globally, more than five years after adding the features to the Android app (Jagmeet Singh/TechCrunch)
Illinois enacted new provisions in its Child Labor Law on July 1 to mandate influencer parents pay their children for appearing in their social media content (Chris Morris/Fortune)
Austin-based Command Zero, which uses automation and LLMs to help with cybersecurity investigations, emerges from stealth with $21M in seed funding led by a16z (Ionut Arghire/SecurityWeek)
Volley, which makes AI-based games played via voice commands on Amazon Alexa, Fire TV, and Roku TV, raised a $55M Series C, bringing its total funding to $75M+ (Stephanie Palazzolo/The Information)
Despite OpenAI's move to shut out Chinese developers from its tech, OpenAI's models are still available in China via Microsoft's Azure China (The Information)
